wikipedia_page.main: Dorothy Boulger became Dorothy Havers and wrote under the name Theo Gift (30 May 1847 – 22 July 1923) was a British writer and novelist.

response: Alice Mary Havers was the third daughter and youngest of four children born about May, in 1850 to Thomas Havers (1810–1870) of Thelton Hall, Thelveton, Norfolk, the family seat, and his first wife Ellen Ruding (1817–1854).UK GRO Birth Marriages and Death records, Church Baptisms. Census. One of her sisters became the writer Dorothy Boulger. Thomas occupied himself in the commercial world of company clerking and administration and in early 1854 accepted a post as a manager of the Falkland Islands Company in the Falkland Islands.Dictionary of Falkland Biography, © 2012–17 David Tatham He took his wife and children with him along with a governess, Mary Coppinger and a nurse.Newspaper reports 1854
